entry.data:
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 80
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT
